title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 333.2 - Guidelines for eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 333.2 - Guidelines for eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Organizations comprised of and representing the handicapped must meet the
following criteria: (1)
nonprofit, charitable
organizations for the visually handicapped must be certified as being eligible
to provide services pursuant to the State Finance Law by the Commissioner of

Social Services; or
(2)
nonprofit, charitable organizations for the other severely handicapped must be certified
as being eligible to provide services pursuant to the State Finance Law by the

Commissioner of Education. (b) Notwithstanding the above, certified
nonprofit, charitable organizations must be represented by, and all contracts
issued through, the nonprofit agency or commission appointed by the State

Commissioners of Education and Social Services in their respective areas of
authority under the State Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
333.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
